Text:
Really?  This is.... A M A Z I N G !

Just wanted to note that this contains, from what I know, EVERY Steve Hoffman remaster.  That alone is worth your hard drive space.... they sound fantastic.

Happy Holidays and thanks again........

This is just too good to be true. I've decided just to go for the remastered albums, to replace my own physical CDs (non-remastered ones).

Thank you!

usually remasters amount to a gang of idiots blasting all the levels on a classic album and making it just about worthless...

are the doors remasters true remasters that a genuine doors fan would be interested in checking out?  

i would love to hear this is the case...and not the former.

niggyniggnigg:

This is the case...

Read about Steve Hoffman.  He's not an idiot.  Download and listen.

with that, i will check it out.  

thanks in advance.

Excellent.....

Would love to hear what you thnk.

But.. this doesnt include "Wierd Scenes From Inside The Goldmine"

:(

Thanks I made my selection from the list. :)

@ SHRUD: If you want Weird Scenes Inside the Goldmine try my other torrent: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5405738/The_Ultimate_Doors_Discography_-_90_Albums_-_All_MP3 . It's only mp3 quality but its better than nothing!

f**k... this is a greatest band ever :P :) i buy a new hard drive for this torrent :P
hey guys i want to ask something.... who sing with Morrison in detroid and some of the new albums? sounds like a black guy but i don't know... no matter who is.... its great :P sound little like jimi hendrix but they eachother with jim :D 
whatever if someone knows tell me please i wanna know who is this guy whjo sing "I'm Your Doctor"
Although it's great that you are seeding this, it would have been nice if you had mentioned that you got this mostly from me / my torrent. My signature is all over it........

MisterKing: To say that I took most of this from you would be a lie. To say that I compiled this would be a lie. This Torrent was on a Russian website. I downloaded it in its entirety and uploaded the original .torrent info to TPB. MisterKing, I however cannot thank you enough for everything Doors that you have provided to the public. I am very grateful.
this IS impressive work here! thanks to everybody contributing to it! keep on!

Do the compilations have any previously unreleased material? For me, it doesn't make sense to buy/download compilations unless they have previously unheard content. If there's something special about the order of track listing (as with some artists), then I make playlists. Great upload by the way!

@antoinethewiz: If you want previously unreleased material, this torrent is for you: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/5991248/The_Doors_Discography_FLAC_-_The_Bootlegs_-_89_Albums

BTW, I am JugzG0nn4G3tY4.
